item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 17, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Moon (1264 points | 118 comments)

3. Voxon: Real time interactive volumetric holograms (89 points | 30 comments)

7. Includeable minimal operating system for C++ (17 points | 4 comments)

13. Crunch – a Scheme compiler with a minimal runtime (157 points | 52 comments)

27. Zaymo (YC W24) Is Hiring Founding Engineer (In Person – Utah) ( | hide)
